description:
Set your own tracks with these poles at your side. Using durable aluminum and titanal alloy, they're ready for long hut trips and quick-hit dawn patrols. Their extended grips let you shift your grasp while sidehilling.

  • 2 section poles that are adjustable from 105-140 cm
  • 18mm aluminum upper and 16mm titanal lower diameter
  • Powerlock 3.0 system for secure height adjustment
  • Padded straps offer maximum comfort
  • Touring Foam 280 grip with an extended grip zone limits pole readjustment
  • Ice Flex winter baskets float nicely without dragging snow
name: Komperdell Free Touring Ti Powerlock Adjustable Poles - Unisex
